zone.line: Thier frowning foreheads as we go —
The giant-snouted gr crags, ho! ho!
How they snort & how they blow!
A rushing throng! a sound of song
Beneath the vault of Heaven is blown!
Sweet notes of love, the speaking tones
Of this bright day sent down to say
That Paradise on earth is known,
All we hope & all we love
Finds a voice in this blithe strain
?toil And ?wavers vibrates far o'er field & vale
And which Echo like the tale
Ho whoo! To-whoo! near, nearer now
The sound of song the rushing throng!
